duties_responsibilities.duty: Audit Individual Operations team members on processes and meet required audit counts.
Coach team members for improvement against quality metrics and provide reporting on performance.
Review service operation specialists’ quality and ensure that all products and processes meet internal and external stakeholder requirements.
Conduct a minimum of 26 units of reviews and coachings daily, with at least 130 units per week.
Develop, plan, or conduct training activities as business needs dictate, and lead projects as well as participate in projects across departments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, Quality Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
